command: tag @s add 游戏中
tag @s add 终结者备选
tag @s add normal_to_boss
effect @s slowness 2 2 true
scoreboard players random @s[tag=!sound_interval] wp_random 1 3

execute @s[tag=!sound_interval,scores={wp_random=3}] ~~~ playsound hunter.hurt_3 @a ~~~

tag @s[tag=!sound_interval] add sound_interval
